title: Won't let me buy Camille with IP
body:
I am unable to buy camille with my IP, I now have 7925 points and when i try to buy camille it says that I don't have enough RP/IP to buy her. Any help on this issue would be greatly appreciated. 


P.S. I did try running the full repair on my client and that didn't do anything.

replies.body:
This is an issue I've been seeing on the updated client.  If that's the case for you, try the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if that solves the IP issue!
This did solve the issue. I also received my gifts from the 2016 season. Thank you much I really appreciate your help.
